name: usagi survivor
description:
Hi! This is our first game jam submission ever, we tried our best to finish in time.
We will probably continue working on this project so we would really appreciate it if you'd continue checking out our progress! <3

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Dash
Q - Instant Clear Skill
E - Interact

~ dubstin ~ Programming, 3D modeling, concept & game design https://www.instagram.com/dubstin/

~ alex ~ 2D art, writing, music, sfx, concept & game design
